name: Susan Crossman
what_you_do: Susan Crossman works as a book coach and editor to help other forward-thinking entrepreneurs polish their stories to make a difference in the world. She also heads a team that helps organizations add value to client relationships through outstanding content marketing programs.
offering: Book coaching and editing services, as well as content marketing services through Crossman Communications
social_proof: Susan has written five traditionally-published books, has a Master Practitioner designation in Neurolinguistic Programming (NLP), a Master's degree in English, and is trained in the Language and Behavior (LAB) Profile and the Enneagram system of personality profiling. She is also a certified Awakening Coach.
signature_programs: Books: Shades of Teale, Passages to Epiphany, The Write Way, Content Marketing Made Easy, Your Personal Marketing Playbook
business_focus: Susan Crossman helps organizations add value to client relationships through outstanding content marketing programs, and helps people write the book that will help them make a difference in the world.
